channel.title: CVE Feed for Doofinder -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Doofinder -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-40602|2024-08-02T18:38:50.903Z -- doofinder -- doofinder%20wp%20%26%20woocommerce%20search
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Doofinder Doofinder WP & WooCommerce Search.This issue affects Doofinder WP & WooCommerce Search: from n/a through 1.5.49.

item.title: CVE-2024-25596|2024-06-04T17:35:27.741Z -- doofinder -- doofinder%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Doofinder Doofinder for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Doofinder for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.1.8.
